### isYmmOrZmmReg() {#af73deea36d6c25eea9242929d3443588}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="static bool isYmmOrZmmReg (unsigned Reg)"
  labels = {["static"]}>
VZEROUPPER cleans state that is related to Y/ZMM0-15 only.

Thus, there is no need to check for Y/ZMM16 and above.

Definition at line <a href="#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86vzeroupper-cpp">X86VZeroUpper.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">BlockExitState = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123; PASS&#95;THROUGH, EXITS&#95;CLEAN, EXITS&#95;DIRTY &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#42; getBlockExitStateName(BlockExitState ST);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Core algorithm state:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BlockState - Each block is either:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - PASS&#95;THROUGH: There are neither YMM/ZMM dirtying instructions nor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                   vzeroupper instructions in this block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - EXITS&#95;CLEAN: There is (or will be) a vzeroupper instruction in this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                  block that will ensure that YMM/ZMM is clean on exit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   - EXITS&#95;DIRTY: An instruction in the block dirties YMM/ZMM and no</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                  subsequent vzeroupper in the block clears it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// AddedToDirtySuccessors - This flag is raised when a block is added to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                          DirtySuccessors list to ensure that it&#39;s not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                          added multiple times.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FirstUnguardedCall - Records the location of the first unguarded call in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                      each basic block that may need to be guarded by a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                      vzeroupper. We won&#39;t know whether it actually needs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                      to be guarded until we discover a predecessor that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                      is DIRTY&#95;OUT.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">BlockState &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">      BlockExitState ExitState = PASS&#95;THROUGH;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddedToDirtySuccessors = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> FirstUnguardedCall;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      BlockState() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">BlockStateMap = SmallVector&lt;BlockState, 8&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">DirtySuccessorsWorkList = SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
